title: Launching a New Energy Drink
description: Your company is launching a new energy drink in a competitive market. Your task is to create a marketing strategy, set a competitive price, and analyze potential sales channels.

title: Expanding an E-Commerce Business
description: An online fashion retailer is looking to expand into international markets. Your role is to assess financial feasibility, market trends, and create a promotional strategy.

title: Rebranding a Fast Food Chain
description: A fast food company is losing customers due to outdated branding. You must create a new marketing campaign, improve customer engagement, and analyze the competition.

title: Reducing Supply Chain Costs
description: A retail store is facing increased costs in its supply chain. You must find ways to optimize logistics, reduce expenses, and maintain product quality.

title: Increasing Sales Through Social Media
description: A new clothing brand wants to boost sales by leveraging social media influencers. You need to identify the right platforms, develop engagement strategies, and measure success.
